description: fluentd 1.x deployed in kubernetes and scraped by prometheus

panels.description:
If you see errors then you probably have serious issues with log processing, see https://docs.fluentd.org/buffer#handling-unrecoverable-errors

Retries are normal but should occur only from time to time, otherwise check for network errors or destination is too slow and requires additional tuning per given provider.
panels.title: Fluentd output error/retry rate

panels.description: This should not reach 0 otherwise logs are blocked from processing or even dropped
